policy would stand deleted.

This add on cover cannot be cancelled on standalone basis 
by the insured. It can be cancelled subject to cancellation of 
base policy by the insured on seven days’ notice by recorded 
delivery, provided no claim has arisen during the currency of 
this add on cover.
